ProjectTitle: Reclassification of kidney transplant rejection and the role of innate allorecognition.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
03/04/2024
Sharing: for sharing of human genetic, phenotypic and clinical data you can consider using EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) this repository keeps the data under restricted access and provides standardized access request procedures via the KU/UZ Leuven data access committee: https://www.uzleuven.be/nl/dac. When you publish a dataset please register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list (and in the future in the FWO report) see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
label: good with suggestions
